Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc., see enclosed Note): Danish, English, English for the hearing impaired, French, German, Norwegian, Spanish, Swedish.
(Sorry, Finnish and Dutch friends, your subtitles were not on the DVD.)

Well-established actor John Cusack committed several memorable crazy teenage comedies in is younger days, and I think this is one of the funniest. 

Really good picture quality and stereo sound for such an old film.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x384, good stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
